moduleMeta.name: vegetationParameters
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: reading vegetation parameters including crop coefficient, fraction of vegetation coverage, maximum LAI, root depth, soil anisotropy ratio, maximum surface water detension and surface roughness

var.name: landcode2D
var.description: landuse code at at each grid of the study area

var.name: Kcanopy2D
var.description: fraction of vegetation coverage at each grid of the study area

var.name: LAImax2D
var.description: maximum LAI at each grid of the study area

var.name: kcrop2D
var.description: crop coefficient at each grid of the study area

var.name: root2D
var.description: root depth at each grid of the study area

var.name: anik2D
var.description: soil anisotropy ratio at each grid of the study area

var.name: Sstmax2D
var.description: maximum surface water detension at each grid of the study area

var.name: surfn2D
var.description: surface roughness at each grid of the study area
